# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your productivity and efficiency. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your life. I'm extending this opportunity to you with an exclusive offer of $150. This price reflects the exceptional value and benefits the product provides. I look forward to hearing your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
